name: GUNSMOKE
description:
Gunsmoke is an arcade style western shooter where the player has to shoot the bank robers who have stolen the money from the bank.
Player have the option to select between several revolvers with their own specifications as it will be efective inside the game.
The game excists out of 2 levels. (street and saloon) and several degrees of dificuilty.
Players High-Score will be safed on the scoreboard and is directly online visable to other players.

Are you able to beat the High-score of other online players ?

Give it your best shot!

Team RetroBullet.
